DOC.brief_summary: This study compare effect cook , ground beef beef protein isolate blood muscle protein .
DOC.brief_title: Nutrient Synergy Beef Stimulation Protein Synthesis Elderly
DOC.detailed_description: STUDY OBJECTIVES Primary : To compare effect consumption 3-ounce serve beef 20g serve BPI skeletal muscle synthetic breakdown rate healthy elderly subject . Secondary : To investigate effect study product plasma level amino acid , insulin , glucose healthy elderly subject .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female . Age 60 year old . Any ( history ) gastrointestinal disease interfere GI function Diagnosed active treatment Diabetes Mellitus type I II History congestive heart failure Recent ( 6 month ) hospitalization heart disease treatment management ( e.g . PTCA , stent , surgery ) Myocardial infarction past year Infection fever 7 day prior enrollment Current use corticosteroid , growth hormone , testosterone Adherence weight loss diet Use proteincontaining amino acidcontaining nutritional supplement within one week enrollment Current alcohol ( > 7 ETOH per week ) drug abuse Platelet count ( PLT ) < 100,000 History hypo hypercoagulation disorder include use coumadin derivative Currently take antithrombotics stop 7 day ( i.e . medical indication ) Allergy local anesthetic Blood hemoglobin < 9.0 g/dL Investigator 's uncertainty willingness ability subject comply protocol requirement
